dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6827 IH: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to increase commodity assistance under the summer food service program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Molinaro (for himself and Ms. Clarke of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to increase commodity assistance under the summer food service program.

section.header: Commodity assistance under the summer food service program
section.text: Section 13(h) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1761(h)) is amended by adding at the end the following: The value of donated foods distributed to service institutions pursuant to this subsection shall be equal to the national average value of donated foods determined under section 6(c)(1)(A).
